pages.text: Stew is a kind of hot drink. It's type depends on its base and ingredients. Its values are the sum of its ingredients, a bowl of soup contains 250mb fluid.
Stews can be cooked with raw ingredients and automatically cook them. Compare with sauteed dishes, it has greater saturation boost but require fluid ingredient and takes longer to cook.
For the stew thick enough, some of its food point would be convert into saturation restored, making a higher saturation ratio.
Potions can also be added to stews. Multiple potions result in duration added up. stew could have at most three types of potion, and double duration.
Shift + right click to place stews onto the world.
